ConfigVersion.description: The version for the config file, this is used to auto upgrade the file in the future

WhiteList.description: A white list of items that can be placed anywhere

ServerAdmins.description: A list of admin GUIDs you can get these from https://daemonforge.dev/SteamId/ (expand more details)

TentRadius.description: the radius of which tents refresh on the open and close action

TentCESpawnLifeTime.description: The lifetime set to tents when they spawn in via CE (to help keep them cycling)

BuildBonusSledgeDamage.description: Bonus Damage done to Seldge Hammers when building a territory

RequireTerritory.description: 1 Enabled | 0 Disabled  When Enabled it will require players to first build a territory flag before placing any objects

PublicPermissions.description: This it the permissions players will have when inside a territory they *are not* members of use https://daemonforge.dev/Calc to figure out the permissions

MemberPermissions.description: This it the permissions players will have when inside a territory they *are* members of use https://daemonforge.dev/Calc to figure out the permissions

Notifications.description: 0 use Text Notifications, 1 use Notifications from the Notifications Mod

NoBuildZones.description: An array for No Build Zones

X.description: The X cordinate for the no build zone

Z.description: The Y cordinate for the no build zone

R.description: The Radius for the no build zone

DrawOnMap.description: 1 Enabled | 0 Disabled if enabled it will show the no build zone on the map

NoBuildZoneMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they try to build in a no build zone
examples: You can't build here, are trying to build in a designated no build zones

TerritoryConflictMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they try to build a Territory too close to another Territory
examples: Sorry you can't build a territory this close to another territory
Lo siento, estás demasiado cerca de otro territorio, no puedes crear uno aquí

WithinTerritoryWarning.description: The message Players recieve when they try to place an object within a territoty you don't have permissions to deploy
examples: Sorry you can't build this close to an enemy territory
Lo siento, no puedes construir tan cerca de un territorio enemigo

DeSpawnWarningMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they try to build something outside a territory
examples: You are building outside a territory, $ITEMNAME$ will despawn in $LIFETIME$ without a Territory
Estás construyendo fuera de tu territorio, $ITEMNAME$ desaparecerá en $LIFETIME$ fuera de tu territorio

BuildPartWarningMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they try to build within a territoty you don't have permissions to build
examples: Sorry, you don't have permissions to build in this area.
Lo siento, no tienes permiso para construir en este sitio

DismantleWarningMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they try to dismantle within a territoty you don't have permissions to dismantle
examples: Sorry, you can't dismantle anything this close to a raised flag
Lo siento, pero no puedes desmontar nada que este cerca de la bandera izada

LowerFlagWarningMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they try to lower a flag within a territoty you don't have permissions to lower flag
examples: Sorry, you do not have permissions to lower the flag in this territory
Lo siento, no tienes permisos para bajar la bandera de este territorio

TerritoryRequiredWarningMessage.description: The message Players recieve when they trying to build outside a territory when require territory is enabled
examples: Sorry, you are required to build a territory to be able to build
Lo siento, se necesita un territorio para poder construir

FlagRefreshFrequency.description: This is to match the 'FlagRefreshFrequency' inside your globals.xml if an object has a lifetime less than this it won't warn the player when placing

KitLifeTimes.description: These are the lifetime overrides for when a kit has a different lifetime the object it self, so that way the warning about lifetimes is correct
